articles.content: Aircraft lessor Air Lease said it was buying 32 more Boeing 737 MAX jets, bringing the total number of orders since the plane returned to commercial service to near 1,000the latest evidence that the … [+333 chars]

articles.title: Hasbro adds two directors, plans to keep Wizards unit - Reuters.com
articles.description: Hasbro Inc (HAS.O) on Monday added two directors to its board and said it will keep its Wizards of the Coast unit, rejecting calls from an activist investor to spin off the profitable unit …
articles.content: BOSTON, April 4 (Reuters) - Hasbro Inc (HAS.O) on Monday added two directors to its board and said it will keep its Wizards of the Coast unit, rejecting calls from an activist investor to spin off th… [+3174 chars]
